definition: thing/matter (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
field/plain/open space/limit/boundary/rude/feral
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]

sentences.english: I am lucky to have colleagues who likes to eat as much as I do.
sentences.chinese: 非常好運地可以和一班鐘意食嘢嘅同事一齊。

sentences.english: Lit. Unless you offend the Government, you can do anything in China.
sentences.chinese: 中國你想可以做嘢，除非觸犯政府。

sentences.english: Life's for living, yeah, that's our philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 生活就是要愜意，嘢，這是我們的人生觀。

sentences.english: You must be very tired after working all day.
sentences.chinese: 你做咗成日嘢，一定好癐嘞。

sentences.english: Something more scaring will happen in your housing estate.
sentences.chinese: 仲有啲更加驚人嘅嘢會是你地屋村發生。

sentences.english: She, at once, go to hospital to find her friend of Jane and to discuss countermeasures.
sentences.chinese: 急搵來系醫院做嘢嘅好友青，商量對策。

sentences.english: And racism shouldn't exist in the human race.
sentences.chinese: 所以人類唔應該有種族歧視呢樣嘢嘅。

sentences.english: I have a lot of things to do, but I have quite little time.
sentences.chinese: 我有好多嘢做，不過我有好少時間。

sentences.english: The things I interest in are more than I can handle, time forbids me doing these.
sentences.chinese: 我想做的嘢太多，但喺時間卻不容許我亂來。

definition: Cantonese particle equivalent to 了[le5] or 過|过[guo4]
old variant of 慨[kai3]/to sigh (with emotion)
possessive particle (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 的[de5]
some/few/a little (Cantonese)
used in transliteration
so (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 這樣|这样[zhe4 yang4]
he (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 他[ta1]
to be at, in or on (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 在[zai4]
correct/suitable/to suit sb/just now (Cantonese)
what? (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 什麼|什么[shen2 me5]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)
to look down upon (classical)/to see/to look at (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 看[kan4]
(literary) to wipe away (tears)/to press with one's fingers/to soak
to look for (Cantonese)/Mandarin equivalent: 找[zhao3]
particle used for interjection (Cantonese)/see also 啫哩[zhe3 li1]
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
to know/to reprimand/to urge/to long for/to tell/to inform
good-looking (Cantonese)
